mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_IDLE (BOARD_IDX, BOARD_CAT, BOARD_SUB, BOARD_CON,BOARD_NAME) VALUES(board_idx_seq1.nextval, #{board_cat}, #{board_sub},#{board_con}, #{board_name})
mapper.update: update board_idle set board_con=#{board_con},board_sub =CONCAT('(수정)',board_sub ) , wdate=sysdate where BOARD_IDX=#{board_idx} and BOARD_CAT=#{board_cat}
mapper.select: select * from Board_IDLE where BOARD_IDX=#{board_idx} and BOARD_CAT=#{board_cat}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS R ,T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM board_idle WHERE BOARD_CAT = #{board_cat} ORDER BY BOARD_IDX DESC ) T) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
